Items.description: Cappuccino is a traditional Italian coffee drink made with equal parts espresso, steamed milk, and milk foam. It has a strong espresso flavor, balanced by the creamy texture of the steamed milk and the light, airy foam on top. Cappuccinos are often garnished with a sprinkle of cocoa powder or cinnamon.
Items.title: Cappoccino

Items.description: Espresso is a concentrated form of coffee served in small, strong shots and is the base for many coffee drinks. It is made by forcing a small amount of nearly boiling water through finely-ground coffee beans under high pressure. The result is a rich, robust flavor with a thick, creamy layer on top called crema.
Items.title: Espersso
